title: Bella Hadid stuns in cowgirl attire and even goes braless as she poses for Vogue Australia
text:
Bella Hadid looks stunning on the cover of Vogue Australia's upcoming November issue.

The 23-year-old model donned western-inspired clothing for the photoshoot, which was a nod to the late South African-born photographer, Sam Haskins.

Inspired by the famed photographer's 1965 book, Cowboy Kate & Other Stories, Bella posed confidently for the cover in black pants, her thumbs hooked through the pockets.

Cover girl: Bella Hadid looks stunning on the cover of Vogue Australia's upcoming November issue

She also wore a busily designed top, which featured a white and black floral corset, colourful floral print sleeves, and a black and silver zip fastening at the front.

It also featured blue velvet draping across the shoulders, with ruching created by silver chain fastenings.

Bella rounded out her cowgirl look with a black leather belt and black velvet cowgirl hat, with the magazine's editor-in-chief Edwina McCann saying the renowned model found the shoot 'empowering'.

Tribute: The 23-year-old model donned western-inspired clothing for the photoshoot, which was a nod to the late South African-born photographer, Sam Haskins

Inside the magazine, the stunning star posed for a series of equally-glamorous photos, this time shot in black and white.

One photo shows Bella seemingly topless with just a Chanel kerchief tied around her neck and wearing a lighter-coloured cowgirl hat.

Another photo shows her dressed in denim hotpants, while wearing a black vest with nothing on underneath.

Western front: Inside the magazine, the stunning star posed for a series of equally glamorous photos, this time shot in black and white

She wore a kerchief around her neck patterned with pearls, and glowers at the camera, a cowgirl hat perched on her head.

In one image, Bella appears dressed in a pair of leather and denim pants, paired with black cowboy boots.

She wore a black bra and cowboy hat, and is seen standing side-on, bowing her head towards the camera.
description: Bella Hadid looks stunning on the cover of Vogue Australia's upcoming November issue.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
